CustomField.description: The amount available as a spiff for this sale. Potential Spiff amount will be calculated by multiplying this amount by the Individual credit for this sale. Populated manually by Sales Ops. Spiffs not related to a specific sale will be created as new Sales Credits and placed on the first or last sale of the month and Potential Spiff will be the same as Available Spiff.
CustomField.label: Available Spiff Amount
